body.name: Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick Clean Comfort 4 Count 72-Hour Sweat & Odor Protection Antiperspirant for Men With 1/4 Moisturizing Cream 2.7 oz

byLineInfo.name: Visit the DOVE MEN + CARE Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 49 mins
features: 72H UNCOMPROMISING PROTECTION: Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Deodorant gives you powerful sweat and odor protection while caring for your skin
NON-IRRITANT FORMULA: This antiperspirant for men is formulated with 1/4 Moisturizing Cream to help retain skin moisture and help protect against irritation for more comfortable underarms
LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE: Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Deodorant features a long-lasting subtle fragrance to keep you feeling fresh and confident all day
CLEAN COMFORT: This antiperspirant deodorant, with a non-irritant formula, reduces underarm wetness for dry, comfortable underarms all day long
HOW TO USE: Apply this antiperspirant deodorant stick on your underarms to help soothe and protect your underarms from sweat for lasting confidence around the clock
CARE FOR THE PLANET: Each Dove Men+Care antiperspirant stick can be recycled. Follow the How2Recycle instructions on the back. Dove Men+Care antiperspirants are PETA-certified Cruelty Free
body.description: Looking for an antiperspirant for men that's designed to keep you feeling fresh and confident? Try Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. Our Clean Comfort antiperspirant deodorant provides powerful 72-hour protection against sweat and odor while caring for your skin. This antiperspirant for men is formulated with 1/4 Moisturizing Cream to deliver skin moisturization and help protect against skin irritation. Discover Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Deodorant's long lasting subtle fragrance to refresh your senses and leave you feeling fresh all day. Simply apply Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Deodorant in an even layer onto each of your underarms for best results. You now have the powerful protection you need to stay fresh and feel confident all day. Dove care goes further than moisturizing protection with PETA Cruelty-Free certification and recyclable plastic packs. Looking for more Dove Men+Care skin care products? Try the full range of Dove Men+Care products, including deodorants, antiperspirants, dry spray antiperspirant deodorants, body washes, face and body bars, and hair care products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful 72H Protection Your day can get busy and stressful; smelling bad or feeling uncomfortable shouldn't be an added worry for you. New Dove Men+Care with Triple Defense Technology gives you better, complete protection, so you can have peace of mind all day. Care For Your Skin No matter which deodorant you choose, your underarms will get the additional care of the 1/4 moisturizing cream that you can only get from Dove Men+Care. Clinically proven care that doesn't irritate the skin, leaving it softer and more comfortable. All-day Confidence Smelling fresh goes a long way to feeling cool, calm, and in control. The long-lasting scent will give you the increased confidence you need to be your best all day, no matter what role you're playing. Care For The planet Dove has been globally accredited "Cruelty-Free" by the animal rights organization PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals).

Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Dry Spray Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Antiperspirant Dry Spray Dove Men+Care Stain Defense Cool Antiperspirant Dry Spray Main Benefit 72H sweat and odor protection 72H sweat and odor protection 72H sweat and odor protection 1/4 moisturizer ✓ ✓ ✓ Size 3.8 oz 3.8 oz 3.8 oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It last a long time!
reviews.reviewText: Dove Men+Care Deodorant Stick in Clean Comfort has seamlessly become a staple in my husband's daily grooming routine. This aluminum-free deodorant not only delivers an impressive 72-hour protection but also keeps him feeling fresh and confident all day long. The moisturizing formula ensures his skin stays comfortable, free from irritation. The Clean Comfort scent strikes the perfect balance between subtle and invigorating. The pack of two adds convenience, ensuring he's always well-stocked. Dove Men+Care has crafted a reliable and effective deodorant that aligns perfectly with my husband's needs for long-lasting freshness without the use of aluminum. It's an essential addition to his daily regimen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aluminum free products that works!
reviews.reviewText: For an aluminum free deodorant I would say that this products actually works pretty good and smalls great. My husband uses this deodorant and it keeps him smelling fresh throughout the day most days. If he isn't doing a lot of strenuous activity it works really well, however, if he is sweating a lot or works out I can definitely notice a BO smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST OF THE BEST
reviews.reviewText: DOVE IS THEE BEST SO FAR! This works so well, I put it on at night (4 swipes) and in the morning it's still there, the scent smells amazing, (and I sleep crazy). It last long when I'm in school the gym. It's overall a good deodorant and after sweating a lot the smell is still there protecting my underarms. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price amd good smell to it, it just does not seem to last very long as far as quantity compared to others. I will keep it it has a very dovey smell, very nice indeed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Athlete Approved - Gf loves it
reviews.reviewText: I play a lot of sports and sweat a lot. I love how this deodorant keeps me dry. I can play a 2 hours game of full court basketball and still smell fresh.I have not noticed any stains whatsoever. This is recommended and I buy it in bulk usually.My girlfriend loves the smell of it as it is not overwhelming but she can smell it when I hug her or she lays her head on my shoulder. She always compliments me on how good and fresh it smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and effective
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my husband who works very hard in the heat so he sweats alot. It smells awesome. My husbands says everywhere he goes person's are captivated by the smell. I love the smell too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Refreshing and Dependable Choice for the Active Man!
reviews.reviewText: Hey there, fellow gentlemen! Let me share my thoughts on the Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick Clean Comfort. Now, I've always been a fan of Dove's range of personal care products, and this antiperspirant stick is no exception. It truly embodies the essence of what it means to be a man who takes care of himself.First things first, the Clean Comfort fragrance is a winner. It strikes the perfect balance between invigorating and subtle, giving off a fresh and clean scent that lasts throughout the day. It's not overpowering, which is something I greatly appreciate. No more worries about unpleasant odors, even during those intense workouts or long days at the office!One of the standout features of this antiperspirant is its 72-hour sweat and odor protection. Yes, you read that right—72 hours! This is a game-changer for any guy who leads an active lifestyle or has a demanding job that keeps him on his feet. Whether I'm out on a hike, hitting the gym, or tackling a busy day, this deodorant stick has my back, ensuring I stay dry and fresh throughout.Now, let's talk about comfort. The Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant contains 1/4 moisturizing cream, which makes all the difference in keeping my underarms feeling soft and nourished. Say goodbye to dryness and irritation, and hello to smooth and healthy skin. It's a small touch, but it goes a long way in enhancing the overall experience.The application is a breeze, too. The deodorant stick glides on smoothly, leaving no residue or clumps behind. I appreciate the solid packaging, which is sturdy enough to withstand the daily hustle and bustle of my routine. Plus, the 2.7 oz size is perfect for travel, making it a convenient choice for guys on the go.Lastly, I must commend Dove for their commitment to sustainability. The Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick Clean Comfort is not only effective and reliable but also eco-friendly. Knowing that I'm making a positive impact by choosing this product brings me extra satisfaction.In conclusion, Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick Clean Comfort is a winner in every aspect. From its long-lasting sweat and odor protection to its delightful fragrance and moisturizing properties, this antiperspirant stick has become a trusted companion in my grooming routine. If you're a man who values quality, dependability, and taking care of yourself, I wholeheartedly recommend giving this product a try. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!Happy grooming, gentlemen!-Mike P.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hold your noses, ladies and gents, because we've got a winner in the world of deodorants! After what feels like a lifetime of sniffing my way through countless options, I've stumbled upon the holy grail: an aluminum-free deodorant that actually works!Let's take a trip down memory lane, shall we? Toms, oh dear Toms, you promised to be aluminum-free, but you still left me stinkier than a skunk in a sauna. Sure, no skin irritation, but come on, I'd rather smell fresh as a daisy!Then we had Arm and Hammer, hopping on the aluminum-free bandwagon. But guess what? Same ol' story, my friends. Stink persisted, while skin irritation became an unwanted guest at the armpit party.Every Man Jack thought it would be funny to irritate my skin and leave me smelling less like a man and more like a wet dog. Thanks, but no thanks!And who could forget the aluminum-free offering from Old Spice? No stink, they promised. But what did I get in return? Skin rashes, stained clothes, and a laundry list of disappointments. Yay.But fear not, for there is hope! Enter this marvelous aluminum-free deodorant with a scent that's as neutral as Switzerland during a cheese crisis. Not only does it keep the stench at bay, but it also leaves my skin feeling happier than a clam at high tide. No more irritations, no more funky smells—it's a true underarm revolution!So folks, if you're tired of battling the stink and sacrificing your poor underarms to the gods of skin irritation, this is the deodorant you've been dreaming of. It's like a breath of fresh air, but for your armpits. Trust me, your nose and your skin will thank you for this delightful find.

Buy this for my teen son and it works great while on boy stink while playing all of his sports. Has a nice soft scent and is not overpowering at all. Also comes in a body wash and shampoo ... Kind of hard to find this in the stores since Dove now has so many different scents, but the Clean Comfort is definitely the nicest.
Me causo comezón al usarlo repetidamente .

reviews.reviewTitle: Bien pero muy tardada la entrega.
reviews.reviewText: El producto muy bien, lo unico que no me gusto es que tardaron mucho en la entrega, pero fuera de eso todo perfecto.

reviews.reviewTitle: El producto está genial, pero la descripción del tamaño es engañosa
reviews.reviewText: He usado este producto muchos años y me encanta. No contiene sustancias químicas antitranspirante, así no mancha la ropa. Pero están vendidos dos tamaños: "paquete de 3" o "paquete de 6." Compré yo "paquete de 6" pensando que llegarían 6 unidades para el precio. Pero no, son 6 "onzas," es decir, 2 unidades, cada unidad de 3 onzas. Así el precio sale súper caro. ENGAÑOSO!
